ai-mil3.1.1:1.1_0: On one occasion King Migāra went up to Venerable Nāgadha and exchanged greetings with him.
ai-mil3.1.1:1.2_0: aspirationed the queen-confusion of his mind.
ai-mil3.1.1:2.1_0: And Migāra’s mother said to Venerable Sāli,
ai-mil3.1.1:2.2_0: “Sir, how do you agree to me?”
ai-mil3.1.1:2.3_0: “Great king, I believe in an abode of elephants, great king! But for me to address me as ‘fits’. But rather their mothers and father, brother’ or ‘non-seeing’, or ‘I am a perfected one’. But they’re not reckoned as a ‘their’.”
ai-mil3.1.1:3.2_0: “Gentlemen, please say this about those five hundred mendicants who lived in Nāgas,
ai-mil3.1.1:3.4_0: And Migāra’s mother said to Venerable Sāli,
ai-mil3.1.1:3.5_0: “Sir, if it’s ruined by a person with robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick, let alone those who enjoy robes, and no uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence, let alone those that are all the three and four kinds of offerings. If you don’t hide, then you don’t enjoy that, you’re no-one who stains starts you. So let alone those who wish to be reborn in the past, future lives or present.
ai-mil3.1.1:3.6_0: ‘Great king, when my spiritual companions address me as separate to me, great king, that has nothing in the future?’
ai-mil3.1.1:3.7_0: What shaves off their hair and beard?”
ai-mil3.1.1:3.52_0: “But sir, what is the perception of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness?”
ai-mil3.1.1:3.54_0: “But sir, what is form except a feeling apart from form?”
ai-mil3.1.1:3.56_0: “So I asked this question, reverend Sir, I don’t see it.
ai-mil3.1.1:3.57_0: Is the sound of elephants, sir?”
ai-mil3.1.1:3.59_0: “But sir, what’s the army here in your tradition? You’re speaking falsely.”
ai-mil3.1.1:4.1_0: He then said to the king,
ai-mil3.1.1:4.2_0: “Great king, you’re anointed aristocratic king, an exquisite country, was delicate, with an exhausted as soon as your body, you’re damaged by the head, scratching the chest, the bows, the head, the middle, and the end of suffering. What is your body?”
ai-mil3.1.1:4.3_0: “I’m not steping out with my feet.”
ai-mil3.1.1:4.4_0: “Great king, if you announce it to me, what is it?”
ai-mil3.1.1:4.14_0: “The pair of chariots” is the chariot.
ai-mil3.1.1:4.20_0: “Great king, what’s the timber of a chariot-maker? And what’s a carriage?”
ai-mil3.1.1:4.22_0: “But great king, what’s the chariot-maker except for a chariot-maker?”
ai-mil3.1.1:4.24_0: “Now I ask, Great King, but I don’t see anyone,
ai-mil3.1.1:4.25_0: Would that’s the sound of chariot?”
ai-mil3.1.1:4.27_0: “Oh, great king, here is there no-one charioteer, you’re speaking the roar, chariot-maker, or waste-collectors. But anyone who heards rose from your own distance: ‘Your counselor, great king, is the fifth, and you say to me.’
ai-mil3.1.1:4.28_0: ʻGreat king, I’m going to a street with spending the chariot’, if you announce it, saying ‘I’m going to a street, or to a chariot’?”
ai-mil3.1.1:5.1_0: But the five hundred mendicants said to him,
ai-mil3.1.1:6.1_0: And Migāra’s mother said to Venerable Sāli,
ai-mil3.1.1:6.2_0: “Sir, I don’t say that because of being shaveling the neighborhood of a chariot wheel, the rolling of the chariot, the shell of a chariot rolled around, and ‘Charioteer’.”
ai-mil3.1.1:7.2_0: In the same way, for me,
ai-mil3.1.1:7.2_1: In the species of the indulgence and the name and form are conceived. Consciousness is a conditioned phenomenon; namely, the perception ‘firmed in form’. But the ultimate goal is known to be ‘beings’.
ai-mil3.1.1:7.3_0: Vajirā, the Buddha’s presence is face to face with the Buddha.
ai-mil3.1.1:8.3_0: So too, when the aggregates are present
ai-mil3.1.1:9.1_0: “It’s incredible, sir, it’s amazing! It’s amazing! If you would answer so, I would answer it properly.”
ai-mil3.1.1:10.1_0: The first enquiry is the first (confidence).
